ons under attack... again/Clash


  Arrow was caught direct and very hard a=
nd a large gash opens up under his right eye. He puts his hand up to his fa=
ce and sees he was cut open. He then tried to slap Stiller's face in a rage=
...

hed directly in his left eye. He stumbles backwards but regains his balance=
. His vision in his left optic was now blurry. He blinks his left optic rap=
idly and runs at Arrow, throwing a left elbow at his face...)
